divs: sighting detailswhere to start =\ i only done this to let you's know that there sightings practically every week here, so yous can come and see for yourself. but to name the best one i have seen was on the 16th of october 2008. as some of you might know we have out own independent base & raff base i live almost right on ross river ( near mt stuart ) on that night i was doing a normall skywatch over the sturat \ harveys range area & around 8:30pm - 10pm i observed a weird looking shaped plane just over stuart, i ran to get my camera witch is a shitty $100 samsung l100. by the time i had returned it had vanished ( at this time im running around the house trying to find it ) a min or 2 later i noticed it was heading away from me towards cranbrook ( suburb ) direction, iv got 16pics of it, but kinda look just like yellow street lights in the sky on the pics ( thats probaly why none of my mates belive me ) anyways iv been observing these things for quiet some time now but have been to scared to say anything ( you heard the storys from people mysteriously dieing ) but a few weeks ago my newspapper wrote an artical about hundreds of people in my town seeing the same yellow disc with the title ' townsville - ufo central ) it had been in sight for about 5mins after slowly heading over the h range ( millitry base is over there ) anyways i would just like to say theres lots of sightings over the last month in townsville of ufo's, and thought yous might wanna know incase you wanna come & check em out. email me if you do come and you can come to my place to watch, big open range & view of the mountains. there have also been numeras sightings of the same shaped ship but with blue-red & green light ( i havent seen one tho, but always looking :) ) anways f*%k the goverment & hope we can get some answers soon. . . oh wait 1 more thing, i have had a dream that aliens were outside my window and came through my room ( but i always lock my door, so dont ask how lol ) and tryd to take me away. and thats when i woke up. i didnt have any scars or anything in my arms or legs so i didnt worry to much about it, but i can tell you i still remember how bloddy scared i was for the next 4days. . . anyways sorry for the spelling im only 18 & only completed yr6, but i'll be on this site regular if anyone wants to talk about there expiriances. josh b
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ingham
This sighting has never been favorited.
